title: Weekly Review with Clay and Buck H3 - Jan 29 2022
itunes:title: Weekly Review with Clay and Buck H3 - Jan 29 2022
description:
Supreme Court Justice Stephen Breyer retires, signaling Dems know they're done in '22. Biden has promised to appoint a black woman to the court. Old pols like Pelosi hang on to office for deal life. Loudon County parents speak out against masking kids, CNN's Acosta calls it a threat to democracy. Carrie Lukas, president of Independent Women's Network and a mom of five kids in public schools in Virginia joins C&B to discuss the battle against masking kids in school.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
